class.name: ImageTexture
class.description: A [Texture] based on an [Image]. Can be created from an [Image] with [method create_from_image].

method.name: create
method.description: Create a new [code]ImageTexture[/code] with "width" and "height". "format" one of [Image].FORMAT_*. "flags" one or more of [Texture].FLAG_*.

method.name: create_from_image
method.description: Create a new [code]ImageTexture[/code] from an [Image] with "flags" from [Texture].FLAG_*. An sRGB to linear color space conversion can take place, according to [Image].FORMAT_*.

method.name: get_format
method.description: Return the format of the [code]ImageTexture[/code], one of [Image].FORMAT_*.

method.name: load
method.description: Load an [code]ImageTexture[/code] from a file path.

method.name: set_size_override
method.description: Resizes the [code]ImageTexture[/code] to the specified dimensions.

members.member: The storage type (raw, lossy, or compressed).

constants.constant: [Image] data is stored raw and unaltered.
[Image] data is compressed with a lossy algorithm. You can set the storage quality with [method set_lossy_storage_quality].
[Image] data is compressed with a lossless algorithm.
